attributes.action: recognise school support staff and technicians as being as important as teaching staff and should be considered when making decisions about pay and workloads.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: School support staff/technicians are the forgotten masses without whom todays schools would not be able to function.  Support staff are treated as second class citizens within the school community and are some of the lowest paid and overworked staff in education.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
